# --- COMMIT BEGIN ---
# <type>(<scope>): (If applied, this commit will...) <subject> (Max 50 char)
# |<----  Using a Maximum Of 50 Characters -->|

# Body : Explain why this change is being made
# |<----  Try To Limit Each Line to a Maximum Of 72 Characters   ---->|

# --- COMMIT END ---


# --- COMMIT HELP ---

# <type> can be
#    feat       (new feature)
#    fix        (bug fix)
#    refactor   (refactoring production code)
#    test       (adding or refactoring tests; no production code change)
#    chore      (updating scripts etc; no production code change)
# --------------------
# <scope> can be
#   dashboard
#   server
#   general
#   configuration
#
# --------------------
# Remember to
#    Capitalize the subject line
#    Separate subject from body with a blank line (comments don't count)
#    Use the body to explain what and why vs. how
#    Can use multiple lines with "-" for bullet points in body
#
# If you can't summarize your changes in a single line, they should
# probably be split into multiple commits
# --------------------
